column4: How do I set my computer to go from eth1 instead of eth0, I want the modem to go from USB so I can play my Xbox online
How do I set my computer to go from eth1 instead of eth0, I want the modem to go from USB so I can play my Xbox online =\ I need some help configuring it
wanna use you comp as a router for the xbox?
Yes, I'm planning on using XBconnect
so you want it to use WLAN and you xbox tho be connect in a LAN from the WLAN?
I just need help setting up the modem, then I'll be on my way
I want to use the USB connection from my modem to connect to the internet
Yes, I see it as eth1 in the network settings..
i dont remember the command of the top of my head but a good man -k wireless helps
I have no switch, there's a crossover cable running to the XBOX, and the PC is hogging the ethernet port that I need..
without a wireless network the usb wireless wont work
I said nothing about wireless, the modem sits next to the PC and I would like it hooked up through USB directly
